title: Where is my blue essence?
body: When I started the game I got the pop-up window that everyone got and it said that I would get about 10k BE and recived nothing, after that I saw that I had a mission that would give me 5.5k BE so where did my other 4.5 BE go?

replies.body: The message is your grand total including your conversion of IP, plus any refunds given from greater runes.  You had around 1599 IP before the conversion which multiplied in addition to the BE capsules received.  I wasn't able to see anything out of the ordinary here, but feel free to reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you'd like more context individually.
